tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_type AS SELECT con.activity_id amp_activity_id, CASE ind.type WHEN 'A' THEN 'Ascending'::varchar(255) WHEN 'D' THEN 'Descending'::varchar(255) ELSE null::varchar(255) END "type", ind.indicator_id amp_me_indicator_id, CASE ind.type WHEN 'A' THEN 1::bigint WHEN 'D' THEN 2::bigint ELSE 3::bigint END id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator ind WHERE ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text;
